name: Strat-a-Dice
description:
Instructions:

  • WASD to move and change selection.
  • [1] to move, [2] to shoot, [3] to melee.
  • ENTER to confirm action.
  • SPACE to end turn.
  • ESCAPE to open and close help screen

Stats are rolled every turn, for you and for your enemies. The number of movements, shots, and melee hits you have is determined by a six sided die plus a modifier, the same if true for your enemies.

Sprites and Tileset by Aleksandr Makarov: https://iknowkingrabbit.itch.io/

Sound Effects from: https://soundbible.com/
